featured.text: The singers usually sing popular folk songs.
A second kind of medicine is called “natural cures,” or “folk medicine,” in which less educated people try to cure sicknesses with various herbs.
Many folk tales originally had some basis in fact and grew out of the lives of real people.
Another fun 37 is shopping at the open market where local folks sell produce grown in their gardens.

other.text: Many folk tales are also tall tales—stories of unbelievable events told with perfect seriousness.
Folk tales are usually the stories of _________.
The success of folk medicine led to the development of doctor medicine.
A culture’s folk tales, fables, songs, and proverbs are an important part of its literature.
Recalling the group’s first tour in Europe, Camake Valaule, a physical education teacher and the founder of the Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers, admitted that he felt very nervous.
Folk tales are both down-to-earth and highly imaginative.
Folk medicine flourished long before the development of scientific medicine and was more successful in ancient times than doctor medicine.
By reading and listening to folk tales, we may gain a better understanding of the true values, beliefs, and goals of a people. 41.
Which of the following is true about Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers? (A)
According to this passage, folk tales _________.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Folk healers choose different herbs to cure diseases without any sound basis.
These folk healers also use observation and logic, but they are not so aware of it.

definition.zh_def: 民間的，民俗的；人們的，普通人的
definition.en_def: Relating to the traditional culture, customs, and beliefs of a community or group of people.
definition.example: The festival celebrated folk music and dance from various cultures.
